updated.name: updated

movie.description: movies in the catalog, not necessarily in stock

active.name: active
active.description: false is equivalent to deleting a customer

paymant.description: Each payment made by a customer

trans.description: a customer transaction (B.M.S.: these are now only rentals. this table name should probably change)
